title: Markdown Editor & Preview
confirm_clear_message: Are you sure you want to clear the current document?
codeblock_text_placeholder: Paste or type your code here
pdf_gif_warning: Animated GIF images will be exported as a static image (first frame only).
pdf_svg_warning: SVG images may lose quality or not appear correctly in the PDF.
pdf_video_warning: Videos will not be exported to the PDF.
onboarding_welcome_content: This editor allows you to create and preview Markdown documents in real-time.
onboarding_editor_content: Here you can type your Markdown text. Use the toolbar to format.
onboarding_preview_content: See how your document will look when formatted in real-time.
onboarding_toolbar_content: Use the buttons to apply formatting like bold, italic, and more.
onboarding_shortcuts_content: Speed up your editing with keyboard shortcuts for quick formatting.
onboarding_finish_content: You are ready to start using the editor. Have fun!
onboarding_coffee: If our editor helped you, consider buying a coffee! â˜•
